00001 #ifndef STATIC_TYPE_DECLARATION_H
00002 #define STATIC_TYPE_DECLARATION_H
00003 
00004 #include <string>
00005 #include "Elements.h"
00006 
00007 namespace PDI
00008 {
00009 
00010 /*** The StaticTypeDefinition class holds one "statictype" read in from a PDI file.
00011   * An example dynamictype in PDI file format follows:
00012   * statictype HEADER {
00013   *    "MessageID" : "UINT 8 $MSG_ID",
00014   *    "Pad"       : "PAD 8",
00015   *    "EventID"   : "UINT 16",
00016   *    "Name"      : "ASCII 16",
00017   *    "Pad2"      : "PAD 32"
00018   * }
00019   * where MessageID has a special mapping to our DataDictionary 
00020   * through the alias $MSG_ID
00021   *
00022   ***/
00023 
00024 
00025 
00026         class StaticTypeDeclaration : public Array
00027         {
00028                 public:
00029                         StaticTypeDeclaration(char* label, int size);
00030                         
00031                         //copy constructor
00032                         StaticTypeDeclaration(const StaticTypeDeclaration& value);
00033                         
00034                         //simple destructor
00035                         ~StaticTypeDeclaration()
00036                         
00037                         //member variable Set functions
00038                         void SetLabel(char* input){_Label = input;}
00039                         void SetSize(int size){_Size = size;}
00040                         
00041                         //member variable Get functions
00042                         char* GetLabel(){ return _Label.c_str();}
00043                         int GetSize() { return _Size;}
00044                         
00045                 private:
00046                         std::string _Label;
00047                         int _Size;
00048         }
00049 }
00050 
00051 #endif //STATIC_TYPE_DEFINITION_H
